summary: The Helping Heroes Act (S.701) mandates the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish the Veteran Family Resource Program. This program aims to enhance the well-being of veterans and their families by addressing social determinants of health. It involves family coordinators in Veterans Integrated Service Networks to connect veterans, caregivers, and survivors with resources and services. The bill also requires a survey of disabled veterans and their families to understand their needs, and it outlines non-discrimination provisions.
